meanings.sent1: The gwine train chugged along the tracks.
meanings.sent2: The gwine car sped down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The gwine turtle raced against the hare.
meanings.sent4: The gwine river flowed steadily towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The gwine rocket shot into the sky with a loud roar.

meanings.definition: Will or intend to do something.
meanings.sent1: I gwine finish my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She gwine bake a cake for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat gwine catch that pesky mouse one day.
meanings.sent4: The sun gwine rise again tomorrow morning.
meanings.sent5: He gwine conquer his fears and climb the mountain.
